name: Ham Quiches
steps: Separate 2 pkgs butterflake dinner rolls into 48 circles. Press each circle into muffin cups. Fill half full with chopped ham, bacon, or shrimp.
Beat together 1/2 pint of whipping cream , salt, pepper and egg yolks. Put about 2
Put about 2 tsp of mixture into each muffin cup. Top with grated swiss cheese.
Garnish the top with a piece of ham and parsley. Quiches may be frozen. Reheat at 375 for 10-15 minutes. Use regular sized muffins if desired.
